ConfigItem.Name: Scheduler::LogPath
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the path for scheduler to store its console output (SchedulerOUT.log and SchedulerERR.log).

ConfigItem.Name: Scheduler::Log::DaysToKeep
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the time in days to keep log backup files.

ConfigItem.Name: Scheduler::SleepTime
ConfigItem.Description: Defines scheduler sleep time in seconds after processing all available tasks (floating point number).

ConfigItem.Name: Scheduler::PIDUpdateTime
ConfigItem.Description: Defines scheduler PID update time in seconds (floating point number).

ConfigItem.Name: Scheduler::RestartAfterSeconds
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the time in seconds after which the Scheduler performs an automatic self-restart.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminScheduler
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::NotifyModule###800-Scheduler-Check
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the module to display a notification in the agent interface, (only for agents on the admin group) if the scheduler is not running.

ConfigItem.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###000-GenericInterface
ConfigItem.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.
